pullRequest.title: Remove code related to invokeWithArgumentsHelper
pullRequest.bodyText:
MethodHandle.invokeWithArgumentsHelper was removed in: #10859.
This PR removes all dead-code related to invokeWithArgumentsHelper.
Related: #7352.
This PR and eclipse/omr#5604 do not need to be merged together. But,
eclipse/omr#5604 should be merged first.
Co-authored-by: Jack Lu Jack.S.Lu@ibm.com
Signed-off-by: Babneet Singh sbabneet@ca.ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: Rather than just renaming the enum entry - it would be better to add the new entry and alias it to the old one so we don't need to do a coordinated merge with the uses in OMR. Once we fix OMR you can do another change to remove the old unused enum entry. This is because there are a few bits of code that are Java specific in OMR that have not been refactored down to OpenJ9.

commit.message:
Remove code related to invokeWithArgumentsHelper

MethodHandle.invokeWithArgumentsHelper was removed in: #10859.

This PR removes all dead-code related to invokeWithArgumentsHelper.

Related: #7352

Co-authored-by: Jack Lu <Jack.S.Lu@ibm.com>
Signed-off-by: Babneet Singh <sbabneet@ca.ibm.com>

beforeCommit.message:
Move invokeWithArgumentsHelper into MethodHandleHelper

This is done to avoid JCL init issues arising from the static methods in
the MethodHandle class, which are referred in vmconstantpool.xml.

invokeWithArgumentsHelper won't exist in the OpenJDK MethodHandle class.
We cannot update the OpenJDK MethodHandle class.

Moving the static method into MethodHandleHelper exposes it to both the
OpenJ9 and OpenJDK implementations. This prevents the potential JCL init
issues.

Co-authored-by: Jack Lu <Jack.S.Lu@ibm.com>
Signed-off-by: Babneet Singh <sbabneet@ca.ibm.com>
